definitions.example: Be careful what you say around Gene because he's the bosses' snoop.
She hired a snoop to find out if her husband was having an affair.

definitions.definition: To be devious and cunning so as not to be seen.
To secretly spy on or investigate, especially into the private personal life of others.
definitions.example: If I had not snooped on her, I wouldn't have found out that she lied about her degree.
